    • Method Detail

      • asCanMailbox

        CanMailbox asCanMailbox()
        Returns:
        the mailbox object for internal use by the network scheduler

      • getMessageId

        public int getMessageId()
        Returns:
        CAN message ID in the lower 29 bits of the int value

      • getMessagePayload

        public java.util.BitSet getMessagePayload()
        Returns:
        A BitSet representing the payload - note that the size of payload (in bits) cannot be determined from the BitSet because it is a sparse data structure. Compute it using getPayloadSize() instead.

      • getPayloadSize

        public int getPayloadSize()
        Returns:
        the size of the message payload in bytes

      • setTranslator

        public void setTranslator(CanPayloadTranslator translator)
        Parameters:
        translator - Specify a translator to use with this mailbox. CanPayloadTranslator automatically calls this when the translator is created with a reference to the mailbox.

      • setMessagePayload

        public void setMessagePayload(java.util.BitSet payload,
                     int payloadSize)
        Set the payload value and size.
        Parameters:
        payload - BitSet with the payload value
        payloadSize - size in bytes.
